alert.note: Alert for Northern Middlesex; Northern New London; Southern Middlesex; Southern New London (Connecticut) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Dense Fog Advisory issued June 26 at 5:18AM EDT until June 26 at 9:00AM EDT by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...DENSE FOG ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM EDT THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Visibility one quarter mile or less in dense fog. * WHERE...In Connecticut, Northern Middlesex, Northern New London, Southern Middlesex and Southern New London Counties. In New York, Northeast Suffolk and Southeast Suffolk Counties. * WHEN...Until 9 AM EDT this morning. * IMPACTS...Hazardous driving conditions due to low visibility.
info.instruction: If driving, slow down, use your headlights, and leave plenty of distance ahead of you.

area.areaDesc: Northern Middlesex; Northern New London; Southern Middlesex; Southern New London
